column5:
I see that the Can-Fest venue has changed to GSR?  I was wondering if it will be as good as what the Peppermill offered.  Will VIP include a full rib buffet or any food at all?  Will there be seating available for general and/or  VIP?  (Remember @ Reno Events center there wasn't any food or seating offered at all.)

I really enjoy supporting this event and am looking forward to August!!

Thanks for your time,

Steve
